hero.headline: Hi, I'm Vedant
hero.tagline: Applied ML Engineer in Genomics & Life Sciences.

about.heading: Little bit about me
paragraphs: I build applied machine learning systems for biological and genomic data, translating ideas from research into production-ready models and pipelines. My work focuses on genomic language models, transformer-based NLP, scalable data pipelines, and interpretable ML that turn complex data into systems people can actually use.

My background spans industry and applied research. I’ve worked on metagenomics and NLP pipelines, designed production ETL systems, and built analytics and BI solutions that support real, time-sensitive decision-making.

I’m motivated by problems where rigorous modeling meets real-world constraints, especially in healthcare and life sciences, and I enjoy working in collaborative, impact-driven teams that move ideas from concept to deployment.

projects.title: E. coli Drug Resistance: Gene Expression Analysis
LAiSER: Learning Analytics & Skills Extraction Platform

highlights.label: Language Models
highlights.description: Developed domain-aware tokenization strategies that improved genomic language model performance and interpretability.

highlights.label: Analysis
highlights.description: Conducted error analysis, ablation studies, and feature attribution to support model interpretability and scientific insight.

highlights.label: Deployment
highlights.description: Deployed inference pipelines on AWS EC2 using FastAPI to support downstream research analysis

highlights.label: Data-driven insights
highlights.description: Analyzing website performance through Google Analytics and Siteimprove, leveraging insights to refine digital marketing strategies.

highlights.label: Website Maintenance & SEO
highlights.description: Spearheading website improvements using Drupal, optimizing the user experience (UX) and enhancing search engine optimization (SEO) .

highlights.label: Marketing
highlights.description: Designing and managed targeted mass email campaigns, and boosting audience engagement on LinkedIn to elevate the digital presence of GWU technologies.

highlights.label: Research
highlights.description: Performed literature review on existing technologies, humanities outcomes to evaluate skills from course syllabi.

highlights.label: Data Processing
highlights.description: Designed and implemented data processing pipelines to clean and prepare large-scale AI training datasets for fine-tuning LLM.

highlights.label: Natural Language Processing
highlights.description: Implemented NLP techniques to extract skills from course syllabi and job postings to the create skills taxonomy database.

highlights.label: Collaboration
highlights.description: Collaborated with community partners and other Institutes to gather insights and understand market requirements.

highlights.label: Data Visualization
highlights.description: Designed compelling Power BI Dashboards and Reports transforming raw banking data into impactful insights.

highlights.label: Data Analytics
highlights.description: Developed 5 end-to-end analytical reporting solutions, using Microsoft BI Tech stack to reduce operational overhead.

highlights.label: Predictive Modeling
highlights.description: Implemented Predictive Models for Branch Target prediction and Deposit/Withdrawal Deferential.

highlights.label: ETL Development
highlights.description: Created and optimized scheduled ETL Dataflows and packages using SSIS for data integration and migration.

highlights.label: Database Development
highlights.description: Designed and Modeled Databases and Data warehouses to suit reporting needs for 10+ banking departments.

highlights.label: SQL Programing
highlights.description: Performed Adhoc analysis, SQL Tuning, SQL Development for Procedures, functions and triggers.

highlights.label: Solution Design
highlights.description: Spearheaded requirements gathering and collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with stakeholder needs.

highlights.label: Data Management
highlights.description: Performed data cleaning and validation for Phase II–IV clinical trials and RWE studies.

highlights.label: Backend Development
highlights.description: Developed Java, JDBC, and SQL backend modules supporting internal clinical workflows and RFP systems.

highlights.label: System Testing
highlights.description: Tested CTMS and EDC platforms, validating data workflows, compliance, and user acceptance.

highlights.label: Regulatory Documentation
highlights.description: Supported SOPs and documentation for IT systems, data privacy, HIPAA, and GDPR compliance.

highlights.label: CRF Design
highlights.description: Designed study-specific CRFs aligned with protocol requirements and downstream statistical analysis.

highlights.label: Data Management
highlights.description: Performed data cleaning and validation for Phase II–IV clinical trials and RWE studies.

contact.heading: Get in touch
contact.body: My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hello, I'll try my best to get back to you! Feel free to mail me about any relevant internship opportunities.
